import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-uploads', templateUrl: './uploads.component.html', styleUrls: ['./uploads.component.css'] }) export class UploadComponent { }
